update_every.title: Update frequency
update_every.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which data is collected from the NTPd server.

address.title: Address
address.description: The IP address and port where the NTPd daemon listens for connections.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Connection, read, and write timeout duration in seconds.

collect_peers.title: Collect peers
collect_peers.description: Determines whether metrics from NTP peers will be collected.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
